snippet: Are the Texans underrated? Where will Andrew Luck land? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.
abstract: Are the Texans underrated? Where will Andrew Luck land? Judy Battista, the N.F.L. reporter for The Times, will answer questions from readers.

headline.main: Have N.F.L. Questions? Judy Battista Has Answers
